recipe.title: Yogurt-Marinated Grilled Chicken
ingredients: 1 cup coarsely chopped fresh cilantro leaves and stems
1/3 cup olive oil plus more for brushing
2 teaspoons kosher salt plus more for seasoning
1 2" piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
**Ingredient info:**Garam masala, an Indian spice blend, is sold in the spice section of better supermarkets and at Indian markets
instructions: Working with one chicken breast at a time, put chicken between 2 sheets of waxed paper and pound to 1/2" thickness. Transfer chicken breasts to a resealable plastic bag. Combine the remaining ingredients in a food processor and blend until smooth. Pour yogurt mixture over chicken, seal bag, and turn to coat. Marinate chicken in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours or overnight. Build a medium fire in a charcoal grill, or heat a gas grill to medium-high. Brush grill grates with oil. Scrape excess marinade off chicken; season with salt. Grill chicken, turning once, until browned and cooked through, 3-4 minutes per side.
